title: [PS2] Blood Will Tell NTSC_UNDUB + Bonus
description:
Blood Will Tell: Tezuka Osamu's Dororo, released as Dororo in Japan, is a PlayStation 2 game released by Sega. It is based on the Japanese manga series Dororo, which was created by Osamu Tezuka. It concerns a hero named Hyakkimaru, who has had much of his body stolen by forty-eight fiends, and has prosthetic replacements. Along with his ally, the thief Dororo, Hyakkimaru must defeat all forty-eight fiends.


Developers: Sega Wow, Red Entertainment, Sofdec, ADX
Publisher: Sega, Tezuka Productions
Genre: Action Adventure > Fantasy
Platform: Playstation 2
Format: ISO
Region: NTSC
Media Format: DVD-5
Release:
09/09/04 Japan - SLPM-65526
09/21/04 North America - SLUS-20782	 	
06/05/05 Europe - SLES-52755
11/23/05 Japan (Sega The Best 2800) - SLPM-66207

Bonus:
Scans 
Original Press Release
Spoiler-free walkthrough by Da_Great_SoFaRo
